01 About Me

Get to know me better

Passionate Frontend Developer from Sri Lanka

With over 3 years of experience in web development, I specialize in creating responsive, user-friendly applications that provide exceptional user experiences.

My Approach

Clean code, performance optimization, user-centric design

My Goal
